title: Short-Intensive ESP (English for Specific Purposes) Integration Course for Medical/Legal/Technical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and understanding of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: A learner group comprising professionals from diverse fields acquires workplace-centered ESP skills using mobile devices, with learning outcomes measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners autonomously explore and utilize ESP-related microlearning content via a mobile platform at least five times weekly.
Learners contribute to real-time collaborative activities with over 80% participation based on pre-learning materials provided in a flipped learning format.
Learners produce and share at least one job-specific customized English content piece using blogging/podcasting.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
